document_data.name: the Broken Wheel
document_data.mainbody: The '''Broken Wheel''' was one of the few serviceable inns found in the city of [[Kadarasto]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description:
The Broken Wheel was named for a carving of a cracked wheel found on the floor in the common room.

This lavish inn was found in the southern part of the city.
document_data.Inhabitants: The inn was owned and operated by [[Mauza Dalidasis]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Rumors & Legends: The wheel carving adorning the floor of the common area was in fact an ''asfr'' used by the ancient [[Geomancer]]s.
